title: Forbidden Love Story
alternative_title: Forbidden Love Story ; Kinjirareta Koibanashi ; 禁じられた恋噺 ; 禁忌的恋情
status: Forbidden Love Story ; Kinjirareta Koibanashi ; 禁じられた恋噺 ; 禁忌的恋情
description:
Description :
        A collection of stories.
1. Kimi no Iinari
2. Onegai♥Oniichan
3. Kateinai Kinkyori Renai
4. Oyako Futari 3LDK Kurashi
5. Yomigaeru Iro
- “Since a long time ago, since I was a kid, I’ve always loved you. I don’t care what you may be. I don’t mind if you take me along with you.” When summer comes, he comes back to the countryside to see his precious friend. What happens when he discovers the true relationship between him and that friend...? Father and son, brothers... As long as they're connected by blood, this maddening love is labelled as forbidden.
6. Boku no Koibito wa Futatsu no Atama wo Motsu.
7. 3LDK Kurashi @ Koushin

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 4: A Father And Son's 3Ldk Lifestyle
